title: President Donald J. Trump is Standing Up for American Innovation – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
March 22, 2018
Under my Administration, the theft of American prosperity will end. We’re going to defend our industry and create a level playing field for the American worker — finally.
						President Donald J. Trump					PROTECTING AMERICAN COMPETITIVENESS: President Donald J. Trump is taking action to address Chinese policies and practices that are harming American innovation.A THREAT TO AMERICAN INNOVATION:  President Donald J. Trump based his actions in large part on the findings of the Section 301 investigation conducted by his Administration.CONFRONTING UNFAIR TRADE: President Trump has made clear that his Administration will confront unfair trade practices that harm American commerce.
